Mermaid Diagram

Very simplified explanation of applying to Georgetown’s DSAN program

flowchart LR
A[Apply to DSAN] --> B(Waiting Period)
B --> C{Decision Receieved}
C --> D[Accepted]
C --> E[Rejected]
